:::: {.about-body}

I am a consultant in __*Biostatistics*__ and a __*freelance*__ developer specialising in the Quarto and R ecosystems.  
I combine expertise in genetics and multi-omics analysis with open-source development, bridging academic/private research with practical tool creation.

:::: {.highlight}

I am __*available*__ for both short-term and extended engagements on __*Quarto related projects*__.

:::

## {{< iconify octicon:briefcase-24 >}} What I Do

I translate complex biostatistical challenges into elegant, user-friendly solutions.
My work spans multi-omics data analysis (*e.g.*, genetics, proteomics, metabolomics, transcriptomics, *etc.*) mostly in a research setting, R package development, and Quarto ecosystem contributions.

## {{< iconify octicon:beaker-24 >}} Research & Publications

:::: {.highlight}

__*49 peer-reviewed papers*__ in top-tier journals.

:::

I have published 49 peer-reviewed papers in top-tier journals including Nature and Nature Genetics, with my most recent [co-last author publication in Nature Communications (2024)](https://doi.org/10.1038/s41467-024-53687-3) presenting a framework for GWAS[^gwas] using repeated measures data.

[^gwas]: Genome-Wide Association Studies.

## {{< iconify octicon:code-24 >}} Open Source Contributions

:::: {.highlight}

Creator of the __*[Quarto Extensions Directory](https://m.canouil.dev/quarto-extensions/)*__, __*[Quarto Wizard](https://github.com/mcanouil/quarto-wizard)*__ Visual Studio Code extension, and __*[Awesome Quarto](https://github.com/mcanouil/awesome-quarto)*__ repository, with __*15+ Quarto extensions*__ developed.

:::

I have developed a few {{< iconify fa7-brands:r-project title="R" label="R" >}}&nbsp;packages (_e.g._,&nbsp;[insane](https://github.com/mcanouil/insane), [NACHO](https://github.com/mcanouil/NACHO)), and although some are not very useful, they are most definitely entertaining (_i.e._,&nbsp;[ggpacman](https://github.com/mcanouil/ggpacman)).

I created the [Quarto Extensions Directory](https://m.canouil.dev/quarto-extensions/), the [Quarto Wizard](https://github.com/mcanouil/quarto-wizard) Visual Studio Code extension, and have developed 15+ Quarto extensions.
My [Awesome Quarto repository](https://github.com/mcanouil/awesome-quarto) serves as a comprehensive resource for the Quarto community.

## {{< iconify octicon:mortar-board-24 >}} Teaching & Workshops

I have developed workshop materials covering {{< iconify fa7-brands:r-project title="R" label="R" >}} fundamentals, and Quarto, with pre-configured Dev Container templates for reproducible teaching environments.

## {{< iconify octicon:tools-24 >}} Technical Skills

Whilst grounded in genetics and multi-omics, my skills extend across modern data science and software development.
I work with Docker multi-stage builds, Dev Containers, CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions or Google Cloud Platform services, production Shiny dashboards, HTML/CSS/JavaScript, and Visual Studio Code extensions.
I support polyglot data science projects with deep {{< iconify fa7-brands:r-project title="R" label="R" >}} expertise complemented by Python integration.
My publishing systems mastery covers the full Quarto multi-format pipeline (*e.g.*, HTML, PDF via Typst, Reveal.js), website creation, and book authoring.
